message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product and I think you'd really find it valuable. I'm asking for $200 for it.
I'm interested in the product, but $200 is a bit steep for me. I'd be willing to pay $120 for it.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I can't go lower than $180. This product is high-quality and I believe it's a fair price.
I understand that the product is high-quality, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'd be willing to pay $140 for it.
